Workflow automation for film and games.





Software

All of our work operate in the open-source domain, here are a few highlights.

Production Stable

  • pyblish - Test-driven content creation framework
  • maya-capture - Playblasting in Maya done right
  • iscompatible - Python versioning with PyPI requirements.txt syntax
  • docker-maya - Docker containers for all continuous integaration with Maya.
  • Qt.py - Minimal Python 2 & 3 shim around PySide, PySide2, PyQt4 and PyQt5.

Experimental

  • openmetadata - De-centralised, pure-Python metadata store
  • be - Directory and environment management system for creative projects.
  • add - Simple environment management

Drawing board

  • maya-memorycache - Remmeber state at the time of caching.
  • task - Command-line task management
